title: 24-hour Fitness Center, Swimming Pool, Close to Sugarloaf Mills
posting_body: ['Schedule a Tour Today: <URL>', 'At Signature at Sugarloaf, we offer our residents everything they need for a luxury living experience.', 'With a variety of 1 bedroom, 2 bedroom, 3 bedroom, and 4 bedroom apartments for rent in Duluth, GA, we have a floor plan that will suit your lifestyle.', 'Each home features large walk-in closets, stainless steel appliances, and an in-home washer and dryer.', 'Within the community at our Duluth apartments, residents can utilize the 24 hour fitness center, business center, and we even have a Bark Park for our furry friends.', 'Our apartments near Atlanta, GA are also ideally located just off of I-85, giving our residents access to all that the city has to offer.', 'A life of ease awaits at our luxury apartments in Duluth, GA.', 'Come home to Signature at Sugarloaf and schedule your visit today!', 'Amenities:', '-Yoga Room', '-Game Room', '-Playground', '-Large Walk-In Closets', '-Stainless Steel Appliance Package', '-Close to Sugarloaf Mills', '-Dishwasher', '-Air Conditioning', '-Espresso Cabinetry with Hardware', '-Swimming Pool', '-Business Center', '-Washer and Dryer Included', 'Call:', 'show contact info', 'Equal Housing Opportunity']
